sentences.en: A burst of laughter made him straighten himself and look round.
sentences.cn: 一阵笑声使他挺直了身子向左右张望.

sentences.en: A few sessions talking to a counsellor should straighten him out.
sentences.cn: 跟辅道员谈几次就会使他改正过来的.

sentences.en: As usual, she helped Minnie clear away the dishes and straighten up.
sentences.cn: 嘉莉像往常一样帮助敏妮洗了碗,收拾了房间.

sentences.en: Come as soon as you can straighten things out.
sentences.cn: 你安排妥当以后,马上就来.

sentences.en: He hasn't come round yet . Could you try and straighten him out?
sentences.cn: 他一时想不通, 你开导开导他好 吗 ?

sentences.en: He's trying to straighten out his finances.
sentences.cn: 他正试图理清他的财务.

sentences.en: I believed the queen could straighten me out if she wanted to.
sentences.cn: 我相信要是女王乐意的话,她能拯救我.

sentences.en: I was left to straighten out the mess.
sentences.cn: 只留下我来收拾这个烂摊子.

sentences.en: If she showed any tendency to coquetry he would be apt to straighten her tie, or if she " took up " with him at all, to call her by her first name.
sentences.cn: 如果那女子露出点卖弄风情的品性,他就会上前去帮她理理领带, 如果她 ‘ 吃 ’ 他那一套献殷勤的手段, 他马上开始用小名称呼她了.

sentences.en: She sipped her coffee and straightened a picture on the wall.
sentences.cn: 她抿了口咖啡，然后把墙上的一幅画扶正。

sentences.en: She twitched the corner of the rug to straighten it.
sentences.cn: 她拉了拉小地毯的一角,把它弄正.

sentences.en: Straighten both legs until they are fully extended.
sentences.cn: 挺直双腿直至完全伸展开。

sentences.en: The bent strip can straighten up by itself.
sentences.cn: 这弯曲的金属片自己可以变直.

sentences.en: The three men straightened and stood waiting.
sentences.cn: 那3个人挺直了腰站着等。

sentences.en: They decided to sit down and straighten out their differences.
sentences.cn: 他们决定坐下来谈判,解决彼此之间的分歧.

sentences.en: We'd better straighten up the house before they get back.
sentences.cn: 我们最好在他们回来之前把房子收拾好.
